Великолепная игра с одним из самых странных сюжетов. Это одна из тех игр, после прохождения которых сидишь с открытым ртом от восторга. Она заставляет задуматься, каждого о своём, но заставяет. За хороший геймплей, приятное музыкальное сопровождения и неповторимый сюжет, я её рекомендую. Для любителей шутеров и научной фантастики она обязательна к покупке!

Игра стоит того что бы в нее поиграть так как сюжет просто бомбезен. Особенно привлекает эта игра своей главной героиней Элизабет. Сюжет очень порадовал, с каждой миссией всё интереснее и интереснее. После прохождения имею очень множество хороших впечатлений. Мне очень сильно понравилась эта игра, вообщем игра на 10\10 балов.

This game lives up to the previous games. I would rate the story right up there with the original bioshock. This game delivers the great plot twists, mind bending character growth, and beautiful graphics that really make you feel like your in Columbia. This game is a must buy.
Игра очень классная! затягивает с первых минут игры!

This game was fantastic. The artwork was amazing; I spent so much time just wandering around marveling at the universe they created. The story was beyond intriguing - things that seem very subtle at first will jump out at you as huge clues and important pieces in what's been going once you hit the end. In fact, I feel the need to run through the game again to catch all the pointed fingers I must have missed my first time through. I'm also now driven to run through the previous two bioshock games due to the way the story concluded - if you're a deep thinker it will appeal to you on many levels. Even if you're not, it's easily appreciable. I'm not a serious gamer, but I would say that combat was fair in terms of difficulty when playing on medium or what would be considered average. If you use what you're given liberally it could be considered easy, even. Still, it's fun, and the use of 'Vigors' puts a little spin on things combat wise. If you're looking for solid story and a good time, this game is for you!

I never became so in love with a game in all my life! Story=Rich/Fantastic   Graphics= makes you feel as if you are there.
Major plot twists.
Great shooting mechanics. 
And definetly better than Bioshock 2, in the sense that you are a Human and not a big daddy.
You do get Guns and Abilites/Powers, But you are not slow and heavy like a big daddy.
And another plus to the game is that its not as dark and depressing as Bioshock 1 & Bioshock 2. Instead you are in the beautiful flying city of Columbia. 
I also love the fact that the year is 1912 because the game and city has a Steampunk vibe/theme to it.
Great game! 10/10 !!! 
Cant wait to buy the DLC!!
Fun

This is definitely my second most favorite FPS of all time, trumped only by Half Life 2.  However, this game takes #1 as the most emotional and mind-blowing game that i've played, it is rich in everything, from story, to character development, to gameplay.  It has a little bit of everything in it, from Scifi elements, to extreme amounts of chaos.  I Love it, and it deserves it's praise that it has got.
Хорошая игра

10 Hours spent on my first playthrough and I still havnt uncovered everything! 
Non the less, this game is incredible, I can see where the negative reviews come in at, and they did deter me from purchasing the game when it first came out. Although the price now is 100% worth it, and the content is incredible... Dont even get me started on the story line, I love it!!! Its definantly the best story line ive come across in YEARS, most game dont have satisfying storylines. 

I cared about Elizabeth, I wanted to save her, I felt vulnerable without her even though she provides no combat bonuses, it still felt safer with her comments. 

Songbird both terrified me and awe struck me, he looks amazing and strikes fear into your core when you hear his screeching, because you just dont know where hes coming from. 

I hated the enemy and was always satisfied with a gorey killstrike. 

Do Not underestimate this game, you will be dissapointed if you do.

10/10

This was easily one of the greatest games that I have ever played, moreso experienced. Being a fan of the classic games as well, this was a wonderful conclusion to the series with an AI that worked absolutely beautifully. Absolutely recommend, 10/10.

Diavolo! Il gioco è COMPLETAMENTE più adrenalinico dei primi due, anzi, si distacca proprio al 99%! Il gameplay frenetico e la buona quantità di poteri, armi e potenziamenti non farà perdere interesse, ma passerà subito in secondo piano e vi ritroverete ad usarne un paio per tutto il gioco, una pecca :/ [...] L'esplorazione è anch'essa abbastanza vasta, forse un pò più del 2, ma non di troppo, sicuramente però più intuitiva! La trama... Beh... La trama inizialmente non è un granché finché non si arriva alle parti finali, in cui scopri e capisci cosa succede e al contempo non capisci, concludendosi in un finale a bocca aperta. Se avete giocato e finito Mass Effect, avrete più o meno la stessa insoddisfazione, MA! Dopo i titoli di cosa, avrete una sorpresa che vi strapperà un sorriso di sollievo. In ogni caso, sebbene non lo consideri un MUST, è piacevolmente giocabile!
That ending. THAT ENDING. 10/10

Bioshock Infinite is without a doubt one of the best games I have ever had the pleasure of playing. The game combines amazing visuals, exciting (yet simple) gameplay along with one of the best stories I have ever experienced in a video game.

Bioshock Infinite succeeds where so many modern games fail. Infinite's gameplay may not be the most original or fast paced like every other shooter that we find ourselves throwing our wallets at, but the game's rich story and incredible sense of adventure sets it appart from the other shooters available.

Bioshock Infinite is one of the few games that upon completion leaves me wanting more but also completely satisfied with the ending.

For me Infinite is a must own game and I would strongly recommend this to everyone.
Might be the best game I've ever played...

Lo que me pareció un poco decepcionante fue la dificultad en el modo difícil, ya que no me pareció realmente difícil (sin ser un jugador con demasiada habilidad).

Ho giocato Bioshock infinite più per curiosità che altro , e mi sono ritrovato a giocare uno dei piu bei giochi di sempe . La storia ricalca il filone dei paradossi temporali , ed e diversissimo sia come ambientazione ( molto piu luminosa ) , sia come storia ai primi capitoli della serie , si puo quasi dire che e un gioco a se stante .
Ottima grafica e divertente l'utilizzo delle skyrail per gli spostamenti , il comparto musicale e ben curato con interessanti easter egg ( quando lo giocherete capirete ) , bellissimo e coinvolgente il finale .

Игра великолепная, все очень понравилось.
Но BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode Two очень разочаровал своей нелогичностью.
Поясню почему (далее спойлеры): 
1. Меня всегда раздражали скриптовые сцены от первого лица. В серии BioShock они встречаются довольно часто, но в большинстве случаев оправданы сюжетом. Но ПОЧЕМУ, предварительно уничтожив несколько десятков разнообразно вооруженных бандитов, Элизабет падает, получив по голове от точно такого же бандита, даже не пытаясь сопротивляться???
2. Нелогичная завязка сюжета - почти всемогущая Элизабет умирает от рук Большого Папочки. Она не боец? Но дальнейшие события это отрицают. Она не могла справиться? С Соловьем справилась.
3. Салли в качестве заложницы. Понятно, что маленкую сестричку можно убить. Но для этого нужно извлеч симбионта. Это дело не мнгновенное. То есть в качестве заложницы Салли подходит, только когда она далеко. Если ребенок радом, даже с приставленным к голове пистолетом, ее можно отбить, она от одной пули не умрет. Отговорки, что Элизабет слабая девушка - глупость, даже на высокой сложности можно устраивать вполне эффективные перестрелки против толпы.

Hmm, a lot of the reviews I saw seem to laud its "treatment of issues" or "stunningly good story".

I feel that Bioshock Infinite is a fantastic game, with great gameplay, wonderful visuals (especially after the dreary rusted look of Bioshock 1+2), but a story full of holes. I think the problem here is they tried to make it too grand, and it comes off as unfocused, but still enjoyable until you reach the climax, finish the game, then realize "hey wait, this doesn't make any sense."

This is certainly not a perfect game, and certainly not "the" perfect game to end the series in my opinion, but all these are thoughts that arose after I completed it. I would recommend a playthrough for anyone who liked the series so far.

The game also turns the idea of an "escort mission" on its head, as your companion is not only invincible, but helps you out with pickups and ammo. Turns it from a frustrating mechanic to a rewarding one.

And besides, I'm a sucker for corsets.

A few sticking points for me:

The ending is weak. Of course, this might be intentional. I have not finished Burial at Sea yet.

Without spoiling anything, towards the beginning of the game you have some choices, which are fun. However, "choices" only appear in the first act of the game. It feels like a mechanic they tested but never fully realized.

I feel like enemies move around too much here, either that or I've gotten even worse at aiming.

Vigors are still all over the place in terms of effectiveness, many are useless.

Again without spoiling anything, there are way too many "variants" of weapons, that you have to upgrade separately. Ugh.
This game is one of the best games I have ever played, would highly recommend it to anyone who has liked the other two Bioshock games
